physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Herpes zoster accompanied by inguinal adenopathy; chest radiograph showed widespread cystic disease and bilateral hilar adenopathy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Over the years, the patient's health declined, developing pleural effusions and severe desquamating dermatitis, and dementia was confirmed upon last assessment.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Hypertensive to a diastolic pressure of 105 mm Hg
